articles.description: A star-studded ceremony revealed the groups for this year’s World Cup in Qatar, even as three teams, including the Americans’ third opponent, still have to qualify.

articles.title: US added 431000 jobs in March in sign of economic health - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: America’s employers extended a streak of robust hiring in March, adding 431,000 jobs in a sign of the economy’s resilience in the face of a still-destructive pandemic and the highest inflation in 40 years.

articles.description: Colorectal cancer will kill over 52,500 people in 2022, according to American Cancer Society projections. Here’s why you should start screening at 45.
articles.content:
